wxString m_author

Detailed Description

This class creates a Scene of a opx-File.

Internally a OaxImport is used.

See also:
OaxImport

Definition at line 33 of file OpxImport.h.

00071 {
00072         // wxZipEntry pointer
00073         wxZipEntry* entry;
00074         
00075         // iterator
00076         std::vector<wxZipEntry*>::iterator it;
00077         
00078         // get first entry
00079         entry = stream.GetNextEntry();
00080         
00081         // walk through all entrys and push them into vector
00082         while (entry)
00083         {
00084                 // push pointer to vector
00085                 m_vector.push_back(entry);
00086                 
00087                 // get next Entry
00088                 entry = stream.GetNextEntry();
00089         }
00090         
00091         // walk through all vector-entrys, find *.xml
00092         for (it = m_vector.begin(); it != m_vector.end(); it++)
00093         {
00094                 // assign entry
00095                 entry = *it;
00096                 
00097                 // search entryname matches "*.xml"
00098                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")))
00099                 {
00100                         // openEntry
00101                         stream.OpenEntry(*entry);
00102                         
00103                         // load xmlstream
00104                         loadXml(stream);
00105                         
00106                         // entry found
00107                         continue;
00108                 }
00109         }
00110         
00111         // refresh
00112         m_scene->refreshTreeAndCanvas();
00113 }

Assembly * OpxImport::loadOax ( wxZipInputStream &  stream,
wxString  reference 
) [private]

Loads the given stream and get its all data.

Parameters:
wxInputStream Load obj-File as wxInputStream.

Definition at line 454 of file OpxImport.cpp.

00455 {
00456         // wxZipEntry pointer
00457         wxZipEntry* entry;
00458         
00459         // iterator
00460         std::vector<wxZipEntry*>::iterator it;
00461         
00462         // oax importer
00463         OaxImport import;
00464         
00465         // walk through all entrys
00466         for (it = m_vector.begin(); it != m_vector.end(); it++)
00467         {
00468                 // get actual entry
00469                 entry = *it;
00470                 
00471                 // check if right entry
00472                 if (entry->GetName().AfterFirst('\\') == reference)
00473                 {
00474                         // open entry
00475                         stream.OpenEntry(*entry);
00476                         
00477                         // wxMemoryOutputStream to cache oax
00478                         wxMemoryOutputStream outMem;
00479                         
00480                         // copy data
00481                         stream.Read(outMem);
00482                         
00483                         // wxMemoryInputStream
00484                         wxMemoryInputStream inMem(outMem);
00485                         
00486                         // wxZipInputStream to read content
00487                         wxZipInputStream inZip(inMem);
00488                         
00489                         // reset Stream
00490                         inMem.SeekI(0);
00491                         
00492                         // load oax
00493                         import.Load(inZip);
00494                         
00495                         // add oax to lib
00496                         import.getAssembly()->setHash(m_libctrl->addEntry(reference, inMem, m_filename.BeforeFirst('.')));
00497                 }
00498         }
00499         
00500         return import.getAssembly();
00501 }
